generations.inputText:
Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Audience: college students
generations.text: What it does: LangLang connects you with language teachers from all over the world. You can find a teacher who can help you learn a language that you are interested in, or improve your skills in a language you are already familiar with. The app has a variety of features that allow you to customize your learning experience, including choosing the teacher you want to work with, setting your own learning goals, and tracking your progress.

Product: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world.

Audience: college students
generations.text: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world. You can get help finding and learning a new language, or getting started in a new one. LangLang also provides teachers with an online resource to help them learn new languages.

generations.text: LangLang is an app that connects you to language teachers across the world. You can get help understanding a language and get tips and advice from our authors. No matter where you go on the web, we's here to help.
